mapper.insert: insert into project (id, click_times,user_id, difficulty, device_id, type, name, state, description, test_time, worker_amount, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{clickTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workerAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update project set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, click_times = #{clickTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_time = #{testTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, worker_amount = #{workerAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, click_times, user_id, difficulty, device_id, type, name, state, description, test_time, worker_amount, create_time from project where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
